content.text: Doing well, thanks for asking! I love to go to museums on the weekends to learn new things and experience different cultures. How about you?
I love going to museums too! I like to learn about history and art. I love meatloaf. What about you?
I like meatloaf too! It's delicious. I'm a big fan of the color pink, but I don't talk to my dad because he's a deadbeat.

Oh no, I'm sorry to hear that. I'm close with my family. I'm going to adopt a dog very soon! I love painting portraits of my dogs as a way to express myself without revealing my secret passion to my conservative family.
That's great! I love dogs too! What kind of dog are you going to adopt? I'm allergic to shellfish, so I can't eat it.
I'm not sure yet, but I'm looking for a small, fluffy dog. I'm allergic to shellfish too! That's so funny.
